subject: Football
Cheating
lead_paragraph: At the center of the New England Patriots’ deflated-football scandal is a 48-year-old part-time employee who had been a glorified gofer for the team for two-thirds of his life.
snippet: At the center of the New England Patriots’ deflated-football scandal is a 48-year-old part-time employee who had been a glorified gofer for the team for two-thirds of his life.
